_header: Jesu that born was of a may / I amendment of mankind
Title(s): Stanzaic Exposition of the Life of Christ and the Feasts of the Church
_description: Stanzaic Exposition of the Life of Christ and the Feasts of the Church — 10840 lines in quatrains

BLHar2250.First Lines:
Ihesus wos gefen hym by resonTo nome er mad wos ston er
                    tre…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…ffrom heuen to hom hit liȝt AdovnAs we in holy chirche
                    con syng

BLHar3909.First Lines: …ffor on a friday bi trewe storyAdam both wroȝt a wayuet wesse…
BLHar3909.Last Lines: …the holy gost as ȝe schun seMay seond be rekenes hu here

BLAdd38666.First Lines:
Jhesu þat born was of a mayIn amendement of
                    mankynde…
BLAdd38666.Last Lines:
…Of oure lyfe be clene & clereAnd with hym in þat
                    blisse be
